Name: The Adventures of Plushie Squad
Description: As your adventure comes to an end, you learn that the Plushie Village still has another surprise waiting for you.
QuestDesc: As your adventure comes to an end, you learn that the Plushie Village still has another surprise waiting for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hahaha. We have your present ready! Thanks to you, the Plushies say they had such a spectacular adventure that they're still having dreams about it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But before the great reveal, there's another special present we like to show you.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's me while I was taking pictures of the stars. And the Plushies?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bingo! Hehe. Although a painting in between, and shrouded in the darkness of the night, they were still able to witness every step you took.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I would say there's a special connection between you. While you were taking pictures of the stars beneath, the Plushies also took a picture of you, as if they were under the very same stars as you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hahaha. The Plushies don't really have a way of conveying their feelings, so I'm here to help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It was really an adventure to remember. Now they are brave enough to go and explore anywhere they would like.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, {Male=Mr.;Female=Ms.} {PlayerName}! The Plushies asked around what you liked and spent quite a while putting together this present for you. Come take a look!
